verses.verse: The <S%H4912>proverbs<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>:
To <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction<s%>; To <S%H995>discern<s%> the <S%H561>words<s%> of <S%H998>understanding<s%>;
To <S%H3947>receive<s%> <S%H4148>instruction<s%> in <S%H7919>wise<s%> <S%H6664>dealing<s%>, In righteousness and <S%H6664>justice<s%> and <S%H4339>equity<s%>;
To <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H6195>prudence<s%> to the <S%H6612>simple<s%>, To the young <S%H5288>man<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%> and <S%H4209>discretion<s%>:

That the <S%H2450>wise<s%> man may <S%H8085>hear<s%>, and <S%H3254>increase<s%> in <S%H3948>learning<s%>; And that the man of <S%H995>understanding<s%> may <S%H7069>attain<s%> unto sound <S%H8458>counsels<s%>:
To <S%H995>understand<s%> a <S%H4912>proverb<s%>, and a <S%H4426>figure<s%>, The <S%H1697>words<s%> of the <S%H2450>wise<s%>, and their dark <S%H2420>sayings<s%>.

The <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%> is the <S%H7225>beginning<s%> of <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>; But the <S%H191>foolish<s%> <S%H936>despise<s%> <S%H2451>wisdom<s%> and <S%H4148>instruction<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H4148>instruction<s%> of thy <S%H1>father<s%>, And <S%H5203>forsake<s%> not the <S%H8451>law<s%> of thy <S%H517>mother<s%>:
For they shall be a <S%H3880>chaplet<s%> of <S%H2580>grace<s%> unto thy <S%H7218>head<s%>, And <S%H6060>chains<s%> about thy <S%H1621>neck<s%>.
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, if <S%H2400>sinners<s%> <S%H6601>entice<s%> <S%H14>thee<s%>, Consent thou not.
If they <S%H559>say<s%>, <S%H3212>Come<s%> with <S%H693>us<s%>, Let us lay wait for <S%H1818>blood<s%>; Let us <S%H6845>lurk<s%> privily for the <S%H5355>innocent<s%> without <S%H2600>cause<s%>;
Let us swallow them <S%H1104>up<s%> <S%H2416>alive<s%> as <S%H7585>Sheol<s%>, And <S%H8549>whole<s%>, as those that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>;
We shall <S%H4672>find<s%> all <S%H3368>precious<s%> <S%H1952>substance<s%>; We shall <S%H4390>fill<s%> our <S%H1004>houses<s%> with <S%H7998>spoil<s%>;
Thou shalt <S%H5307>cast<s%> thy <S%H1486>lot<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> <S%H259>us<s%>; We will all have one <S%H3599>purse<s%>:
My <S%H1121>son<s%>, <S%H3212>walk<s%> not thou in the <S%H1870>way<s%> with <S%H4513>them<s%>; Refrain thy <S%H7272>foot<s%> from their <S%H5410>path<s%>:
For their <S%H7272>feet<s%> <S%H7323>run<s%> to <S%H7451>evil<s%>, And they make <S%H4116>haste<s%> to <S%H8210>shed<s%> <S%H1818>blood<s%>.
For in <S%H2600>vain<s%> is the <S%H7568>net<s%> <S%H2219>spread<s%> In the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of any <S%H1167>bird<s%>:
And these lay <S%H693>wait<s%> for their own <S%H1818>blood<s%>; They lurk <S%H6845>privily<s%> for their own <S%H5315>lives<s%>.
So are the <S%H734>ways<s%> of every one that is <S%H1214>greedy<s%> of <S%H1215>gain<s%>; It taketh <S%H3947>away<s%> the <S%H5315>life<s%> of the owners <S%H1167>thereof<s%>.
Wisdom <S%H2454><s%> <S%H7442>crieth<s%> aloud in the <S%H2351>street<s%>; She <S%H5414>uttereth<s%> her <S%H6963>voice<s%> in the broad <S%H7339>places<s%>;

She <S%H7121>crieth<s%> in the chief <S%H7218>place<s%> of <S%H1993>concourse<s%>; At the <S%H6607>entrance<s%> of the <S%H8179>gates<s%>, In the <S%H5892>city<s%>, she <S%H559>uttereth<s%> her <S%H561>words<s%>:

How <S%H6612>long<s%>, ye simple ones, will ye <S%H157>love<s%> <S%H6612>simplicity<s%>? And <S%H3887>scoffers<s%> <S%H2530>delight<s%> them in <S%H3944>scoffing<s%>, And <S%H3684>fools<s%> <S%H8130>hate<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>?
Turn <S%H7725><s%> you at my <S%H8433>reproof<s%>: <S%H5042>Behold<s%>, I will pour out my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> upon <S%H3045>you<s%>; I will make known my words unto <S%H1697>you<s%>.
Because I have <S%H7121>called<s%>, and ye have <S%H3985>refused<s%>; I have stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and no man hath <S%H7181>regarded<s%>;
But ye have set at <S%H6544>nought<s%> all my <S%H6098>counsel<s%>, And <S%H14>would<s%> none of my <S%H8433>reproof<s%>:
I also will <S%H7832>laugh<s%> in the day of your <S%H343>calamity<s%>; I will <S%H3932>mock<s%> when your <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%>;

When your <S%H6343>fear<s%> <S%H935>cometh<s%> as a <S%H5492>storm<s%>, And your <S%H343>calamity<s%> <S%H857>cometh<s%> on as a <S%H5492>whirlwind<s%>; When <S%H6869>distress<s%> and <S%H6695>anguish<s%> come upon <S%H935>you<s%>.
Then will they <S%H7121>call<s%> upon <S%H6030>me<s%>, but I will not answer; They will seek me <S%H7836>diligently<s%>, but they shall not find <S%H4672>me<s%>:
For that they <S%H8130>hated<s%> <S%H1847>knowledge<s%>, And did not <S%H977>choose<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>:
They <S%H14>would<s%> none of my <S%H6098>counsel<s%>; They <S%H5006>despised<s%> all my <S%H8433>reproof<s%>.
Therefore shall they <S%H398>eat<s%> of the <S%H6529>fruit<s%> of their own <S%H1870>way<s%>, And be <S%H7646>filled<s%> with their own <S%H4156>devices<s%>.
For the <S%H4878>backsliding<s%> of the <S%H6612>simple<s%> shall <S%H2026>slay<s%> <S%H7962>them<s%>, And the careless ease of <S%H3684>fools<s%> shall destroy <S%H6>them<s%>.
But whoso <S%H8085>hearkeneth<s%> unto me shall <S%H7931>dwell<s%> <S%H983>securely<s%>, And shall be <S%H7599>quiet<s%> without <S%H6343>fear<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%>.
